condition: Chronic Fibrosing Interstitial Lung Disease With A Progressive Phenotype
review: Have been on OFEV 3 months. I didn’t have any side effects until after my gastric sleeve surgery in February. Now experiencing diarrhea and nausea almost daily. Don’t know if it’s from OFEV or gastric surgery. Pulmonary function seems to be better.

condition: Chronic Fibrosing Interstitial Lung Disease With A Progressive Phenotype
review: Started taking this 2 months ago @150mg, 2xday.  It has got rid of my appetite and taste. I get mild nausea and some headaches. Worst of it is that I have horrible fatigue. I was feeling fairly well before lung biopsy and starting Ofev.  Energy was good with minimal shortness of breath. Now I wake up exhausted.  DR considering lowering my dose. I can't yet say if the medicine has been effective til my next scan.
